price: Ambao wanafanya ubakhili, na wanaamrisha watu wafanye ubakhili. Na anaye geuka, basi Mwenyezi Mungu ni Mwenye kujitosha, Msifiwa.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَبۡخَلُونَ وَيَأۡمُرُونَ ٱلنَّاسَ بِٱلۡبُخۡلِۗ وَمَن يَتَوَلَّ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلۡغَنِيُّ ٱلۡحَمِيدُ

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yabkhalūna wayamurūna al-nāsa bil-bukh'li waman yatawalla fa-inna al-laha huwa al-ghaniyu al-ḥamīdu
